SEARCH
Package gutek.gui.controllers.deck

Class RevisionSearchFXMLController

java.lang.Object
gutek.gui.controllers.FXMLController
gutek.gui.controllers.deck.RevisionSearchFXMLController
@Component public class RevisionSearchFXMLController extends FXMLController
Controller class for searching cards within a deck.

This view provides a form for searching cards by their front or back text and displays matching results in a list, with options to edit or delete each card.

      fxmlFileLoader - Utility for loading FXML files associated with this scene.
      translationService - Service for retrieving translations for the UI.
      menuBarFXMLController - Controller for the main menu bar.

      cardService - Service for managing cards.
